title: Regional Recycling Collection and Delivery Network

Trucks have a maximum load capacity of `<capacity>` kg, and routes must be completed within a `<time_limit>`-hour window to ensure operational efficiency. The goal is to minimize total travel distance while ensuring no overloaded vehicles and balancing workload across depots.

content: A construction logistics firm uses regional depots (`<loc_depot>`) to deliver machinery and materials (linehaul) to construction sites (`<loc_customer>`) and collect scrap metal and debris (backhaul).
